page.title: 14Wildlife
page.content: There are many different types of animals in our area.Here we are very lucky,as we have many unspoiled woodlands therefore animals such as squirrels,mice,foxes, rabbits,badgers and hedgehogs are thriving in our midst. Down by the river-side there are water voles and water rats.By the ponds there are frogs and toads. Many people in our area love to hunt animals such as foxes and rabbits.They do this not for food nor furs but for pleasure.In spite of this I firmly believe that our wildlife will not disappear as we have such an abundunce of animals.
